::Astral::

Astral sits down in a char as Composer enters, gesturing to one of 
the other two seats.

"You can sit down if you want," he says as the shuttle lifts off and 
flies toward the Alliance island, "We'll be there in several seconds."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Composer::
> 
>      Composer followed Astral onto the shuttle.  He still was 
afraid that
> Astral or somebody else would blast him to pieces.  He had to be 
strong,
> though.
